author: veithen
msg: Merged the methods of the DataHandlerReaderUtils class into XMLStreamReaderUtils. This fixes the mistake made in r1026835, which put the class into the wrong package (the utility methods are related to StAX, not to JAF). It also solves the issue of the duplicate getDataHandlerReader (which existed both in DataHandlerReaderUtils and XMLStreamReaderUtils).
